exiftool.Flags: IDList, RelativePath, CommandArgs, IconFile, Unicode, ExpString, ExpIcon

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects suspicious powershell process starts with base64 encoded commands (e.g. Emotet)
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Markus Neis, Jonhnathan Ribeiro, Daniil Yugoslavskiy, Anton Kutepov, oscd.community

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects PowerShell command line patterns in combincation with encoded commands that often appear in malware infection chains
Detects usage of a base64 encoded "IEX" cmdlet in a process command line
Detects usage of a base64 encoded "FromBase64String" cmdlet in a process command line

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Change PowerShell Policies to an Insecure Level
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects changing the PowerShell script execution policy to a potentially insecure level using the "-ExecutionPolicy" flag.

Adversaries may use hidden windows to conceal malicious activity from the plain sight of users.
In some cases, windows that would typically be displayed when an application carries out an operation can be hidden

match_context.values: @{ScriptBlockText=Start-Process powershell -WindowStyle hidden -ArgumentList "-WindowStyle Hidden", "-NoLogo", "-NoProfile", "-ExecutionPolicy Bypass", "-EncodedCommand  [TRUNCATED]; MessageTotal=1; ScriptBlockId=023c0167-5ac2-4e70-a1b2-991136720a44; Path=; EventID=4104; MessageNumber=1}

@{ScriptBlockText=Start-Process powershell -WindowStyle hidden -ArgumentList "-WindowStyle Hidden", "-NoLogo", "-NoProfile", "-ExecutionPolicy Bypass", "-EncodedCommand  [TRUNCATED]; Path=; ScriptBlockId=b657b2dd-7234-421d-981d-e3abea6aa8e1; MessageTotal=1; EventID=4104; MessageNumber=1}

@{ScriptBlockText=Start-Process powershell -WindowStyle hidden -ArgumentList "-WindowStyle Hidden", "-NoLogo", "-NoProfile", "-ExecutionPolicy Bypass", "-EncodedCommand  [TRUNCATED]; MessageTotal=1; ScriptBlockId=5173907f-7041-40e9-8a65-cbe7625fe088; Path=; EventID=4104; MessageNumber=1}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Usage Of Web Request Commands And Cmdlets - ScriptBlock
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects the use of various web request commands with commandline tools and Windows PowerShell cmdlets (including aliases) via PowerShell scriptblock logs
Detects usage of "Reflection.Assembly" load functions to dynamically load assemblies in memory

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Suspicious Execution of Powershell with Base64
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Commandline to launch powershell with a base64 payload
Detects non-interactive PowerShell activity by looking at the "powershell" process with a non-user GUI process such as "explorer.exe" as a parent.

threat_severity.level_description: Severity HIGH because it was considered trojan. Other contributing factor was that it could not be run in sandboxes.
